title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.6 - Admission pro hac vice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.6 - Admission pro hac vice

State Regulations
(a) Applications for admission
pro hac vice
with respect to an
appeal or proceeding pending in the Appellate Division, Fourth Department shall
be made pursuant to section
1250.4
(e) of this

Title. (b) Applications for
admission
pro hac vice
pursuant to section
520.11
(a)(2) or
(b) of this Title shall be made only to the

Appellate Division. (c) All other
applications for admission
pro hac vice
in any court within
the Fourth Judicial Department shall be made to the court of record in which
the attorney seeks such admission and shall otherwise comply with section
520.11
of this Title, the rules of
the court in which the application is made, and any other applicable law or
rule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1015.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
